mapper.insert: insert into members(mb_id, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_email, mb_ph, mb_signup, mb_ad1, mb_ad2, mb_ad3, mb_del) values(#{mb_id}, #{mb_pw}, #{mb_name}, #{mb_email}, #{mb_ph}, curdate(), #{mb_ad1}, #{mb_ad2}, #{mb_ad3}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from members where mb_ph=#{mb_ph};
mapper.update: update members set mb_pw=#{mb_pw}, mb_ph=#{mb_ph}, mb_ad1=#{mb_ad1}, mb_ad2=#{mb_ad2}, mb_ad3=#{mb_ad3} where mb_number=#{mb_number};
mapper.select: select count(*) from members where mb_signup = #{today};
